Posts.Content: I personally hate that the big pharma companies spend money advertising to the general public. Such a waste of dollars. Would rather see that advertising money go to people need treatment, people who do not have good insurance coverage. I am blessed that while this medication is over $12,000. for 21 pills, my insurance coverage makes it possible. That is likely not the case for many.
Posts.Title: Commercials for Ibrance, etc.
